pullrequest.title: Implement collision filtering based on collide_bitmask property

content.raw:
Ohhh I see!

It makes sense to leverage that, but I think this implementation has some holes in it, then. If the bitmask of an object gets changed, then we need to make sure we recalculate all the pairs that it should be blacklisted with. In the current implementation, changing the bitmask will only add more pairs to the blacklist and not remove any previous pairs.
